'I said STOP!'%K%P
'Ah! Y-Yamato?'%K%P
I shouted again, and shook off\nthe temptations of the flesh.%K%P
'Dance practice is over!\nPut on some clothes and come to the shop!'%K%P
'Wait, Yamato?'%K%P
I turned my back on her,\nand rushed from my room.%K%P
When I was alone,\nI sighed heavily.%K%P
'Oh man, that was close...'%K%P
When I touched my chest,\nI could feel my heart pounding wildly.%K%P
The sight I'd just witnessed was burned into my eyes,\nand wouldn't go away.%K%P
'Ugh, she always overdoes it, that Kagura...'%K%P
I started breathing deeply,\ntrying to settle myself down.%K%P
Needless to say,\nit didn't really do much good.%K%P
'I'm here!'%K%P
'Oh, hey.'%K%P
After a while, Kagura showed up at the shop\nwearing her school uniform.%K%P
I couldn't help remembering what I'd seen,\nso I found it hard to look directly at her.%K%P
'So hey, how was my dancing?'%K%P
'Too close, a little too close!'%K%P
Kagura ignored my protest\nand squeezed up even closer to me.%K%P
Maybe it was intentional, maybe not...%K%P
'Never mind that, what about my dancing?\nDid it get your heart pounding?'%K%P
'Oh yeah. It really had me going.'%K%P
'Oh, really?'%K%P
'Really.'%K%P
'Woo-hoo!\nWell, why didn't you say so earlier?'%K%P
'I did!\nYou were out of control and just didn't listen.'%K%P
'Huh? Is that so...\nWell, I was just having so much fun.'%K%P
She said with an innocent smile.\nWhat can I say, it was just so...Kagura...%K%P
'Well, if I got you excited,\nthen I guess it was a success!'%K%P
'Yeah, it sure was... I mean, like hell it was!'%K%P
'Is that supposed to be some kind of joke??'%K%P
'Besides, you said you were excited!\nIsn't that what we wanted?'%K%P
'No, stripping down is going way too far.\nIf you tried that at the audition,\nit could be the end of your idol career.'%K%P
'Oh, come on now...'%K%P
Kagura cocked her head at me,\nlike she thought I was over-exaggerating.%K%P
'...Seriously?'%K%P
'Seriously.'%K%P
'Aww, come ooon.\nI totally thought that would work!'%K%P
'Well, at any rate, stripping is definitely out.\nGot it?'%K%P
'...Okay.\nI don't want to give up being an idol,\nso I guess I won't strip.'%K%P
Kagura nodded, though she didn't seem happy about it.\nHer answer was a huge relief.%K%P
'However, your dancing was really great.'%K%P
'Even without stripping,\nI think that would really do the trick.'%K%P
'Really? Your reaction at first was so weak,\nI'm surprised to hear you say that.'%K%P
'At first, yeah... But the later half,\nwhen you were really moving,\nthat was super appealing.'%K%P
'In fact, it was like I couldn't stop watching...\nYou really are Ame no Uzume...'%K%P
'Hehehe, you think?\nYou complimenting me is kind of embarrassing.'%K%P
Kagura smiled happily.\nShe was especially cute like that.%K%P
'Alright then, I'll keep working in that direction!'%K%P
'Right, just remember, no stripping!'%K%P
'I know, I know. Anyway, now that I think about it,\nI wouldn't want anyone else to see me like that.'%K%P
'What?'%K%P
'Huh? What am I going on about?\nBut for some reason, I feel it's true.'%K%P
'Hey, why do you suppose that is?'%K%P
'I don't think I'm the right person to ask...'%K%P
Her words were so unexpected,\nI couldn't quite wrap my head around them.%K%P
She didn't mind me seeing her,\nbut other people were no good... What could...%K%P
'Huh... I don't really get it, but when\nI think about you watching me, I get excited.'%K%P
'And my body heats up,\nand I want you to watch more...'%K%P
'With other people,\nI'm just happy when they watch me dance. How weird.'%K%P
'Y-Yeah, it is.'%K%P
When Kagura said this, my heart started pounding\nharder than it had when I watched her dance earlier.%K%P
It was almost as if she was saying\nI was something special to her...!%K%P
Okay now, settle down. This is Kagura, there's no way\nit's got any special meaning.%K%P
'You know, that's probably because\nusually it's a big crowd watching you,\nbut today it was just the two of us.%K%P
'It was an unusual situation,\nso the feeling was different, I bet.'%K%P
'Hmm, I wonder...'%K%P
'That's probably it.\nAnyway, keep up dance practice, okay?'%K%P
'While we're talking, all the others\nare surely practicing hard, right?'%K%P
'Oh, you're right. Okay, I can't let Shuri win!'%K%P
Kagura seemed to get fired up by my words.%K%P
It was a good thing\nthat I was able to throw her off so quickly.%K%P
This audition was everything.\nWe couldn't let anything else\nkeep her from focusing on it.%K%P
For now, at least...%K%P
